reviewtext: I actually purchased some software to allow me to do IR hotsync - so I wouldn't have to carry a cable.  However - twice so far - I've lost all data on my handspring - both times while traveling.This is coming from someone who is ultra careful, I have spare batteries everywhere - and I  change them out fast and one at a time - but for some reason it just  happens...  (I'm also a power user - use my handspring constantly - reading  books, etc. so I've been through lots of batteries - probably more than  most others).If you travel a lot - and you trust everything to your palm  (address book, schedule, frequent flier numbers, contact info, memo's...)  you'll be lost in a foreign city/country when your memory dies.This  insurance is worth every penny - plus you can AvantGo while On The Go!
